result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kerri K. Keller

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 17, 2022 at 10:45 am.

Case Called: 2:18 p.m.
Clerk: Nicole.

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant appears via Zoom video. Atty Thomas Roley appears in person.

Date and Time Set for a Review Hearing. VRCW.

Atty Roley makes statement.
COURT sets this matter for a pre-trial conference on 11/17/22 at 10:45 a.m.

Next Date: PTC 11/17/22 at 10:45 a.m. (Defendant is excused, must be available by phone)

Adj: 2:19 p.m.

Adjustment Number: 22A 201917,
Payable Number: 281364,
Receipt Number: 22R 005725P,
Amount: $20.00
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Deft appears by phone - Deft notes she has recently retained Atty Tom Roley. Prelim remains on as set at this time.

Clerk: Amy
Case called at 10:04 a.m. 
Defendant appears by phone. 

Court questions defendant RE: Employment/Income; Defendant makes statement. 
Court denies appointment of Counsel; Defendant not found indigent.

Next hearing>>>PTC 9/28/22 at 9:20 a.m. 

Adj:  10:06 a.m. 

c. Branch 3.

Indigency hearing on September 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 28, 2022 at 09:20 am.
Preliminary Hearing on October 26, 2022 at 02:20 pm.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Comply with any family court order. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:33 p.m.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Defendant appears in person, pro se.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 

COURT ORDERS: $5,000.00 signature bond previously ordered to continue.

CONDITIONS: 
- Comply with any family court order.
- fingerprints and photographs.   

DATES:
IH: 9/8/22 @ 9:30 a.m. 
PH:10/26 @ 2:20 p.m. 
PTC W/JA: 9/28 @ 9:20 a.m.


Adjourned: 2:37 p.m.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 2:32 pm 
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett; Defendant appears in person, pro se. 
Date and time was set for initial appearance. 
Deft states she was not properly/timely notified of Court today. 
Deft states wish to have case reset for another day. 
COURT advises deft of right to counsel and how to obtain counsel. 

COURT ORDERS: $5000 signature bond - CONDITIONS: 
- Comply with any family court order. 

Initial Appearance reset 9/2/2022 to 2:30 pm in Br. 2.
Comply with any family court order
